articles.title: Lightweight black hole or massive neutron star? | Physics Today - American Institute of Physics
articles.description: An object in a binary system defies categorization.
articles.content:
An artists impression of a newly discovered binary system, with the massive companion star assumed to be a black hole. Credit: Daniëlle Futselaar (artsource.nl)
